parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns max load value of given container. Currently works only with uniform, vest and backpack classes.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getContainerMaxLoad''' containerClass

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> containerClass: [[String]] - uniform, vest or backpack class

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - load value, -1 if not available.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_maxLoadUniform = [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[uniform]] [[player]];
_maxLoadVest = [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[vest]] [[player]];
_maxLoadBackpack = [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[backpack]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[load]], [[loadAbs]], [[loadUniform]], [[loadBackpack]], [[loadVest]], [[getMass]], [[weightRTD]]
</value></part></template></root>
